message.body: You still in Philly or back in ct
Currently sitting in a massive traffic jam in Connecticut
Well that sucks. We're heading back, wanted to see if you wanted to grab some coffee or too tired after thevweekend
What time do you think you'll hit new haven
Sorry, jam cleared so I could actually drive again. At my apartment now- let me make sure I can find someplace that's open and I'll get back to you
Doesn't need to be anything fancy just wanted to stop by and say hello
Blue state coffee is open- that's a 10 minute walk or five minute drive if you don't want to deal with parking your car near my place. So, I'm in if you guys feel like stopping :-)
We do. But we just hit traffic.... bad. So it looks like 9 now :(
If you're on the mass pike, it should clear up after Auburn. But whenever, I'm here :-)
Cool .ill hit ya upbwhenb we're close
